ygData.subject: Re: In the Bridge Again?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She got up and wiped her face.  She knew it would be a long time before things would be close to what she wanted them to be, peacefull.  She felt hungry

::Battera::

She got up and wiped her face.  She knew it would be a long time 
before things would be close to what she wanted them to be, 
peacefull.  She felt hungry and wanted to get something to eat. She 
went to open the door, but it wouldn't open.  She pressed the button 
again and again.
The door didn't open.  She stepped back.  Was it a Maximal trick? 
Were they going to keep her in here and fire the autoguns on her?  
Were they going to kill her after all this time? She knew that Rex 
didn't like her, but would he kill her?
She banged on the door with her fists."Let me out!"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex raises an eyebrow as Battera shuts the door in his face. She 
seemed 
> almost mad at him! He shrugged, pressing several buttons on the 
control panel 
> to lock the door from the outside. It would keep her out of trouble.
> 
> Rex turns, walking off toward the brig to relieve Firearm.
